title: Need a job this holiday? AI Resume Builder can make it happen for only $33
content:
Macworld

A typical hiring manager will only give a resume a 10 to 15-second glance before deciding whether the applicant is suitable for an open job, and 75 percent of applicants end up out of the running based on their resume alone. 

If you or a loved one needs a little help making sure your resume is making the first impression it needs to make, let AI Resume Builder take the reins. This all-in-one AI resume writer and ATS-friendly resume builder ensures all those details are covered without all the extra effort, creating a modern, ATS-friendly resume that helps job seekers get hired. It’s now only $32.97 (reg. $468) through November 9th! 

Using easy drag-and-drop layouts, this system helps users craft a stylish, effective resume in half the time it would take doing it on their own. With enhanced design controls, customizable sections, and easy toggles, you can craft each resume to the specific job you’re seeking, with smart AI prompts to improve the writing for both cover letters and resume bullet points.

AI Resume Builder allows users to create up to 10 unique resumes per month, so you can give each the individual touch it needs to land the all-important interview. You can create multiple resumes for different job profiles, add your social handles for a personal touch, and insert separate profile photos per resume.

Give the gift of a more streamlined job application process with a lifetime subscription to AI Resume Builder, now just $32.97 until November 9th at 11:59pm Pacific!

 

AI Resume Builder: Lifetime Subscription

Just $32.97 through Macworld!
